subject: Personal Finance
title: The Labor Market
description: A quick win: understand The Labor Market.

hook.text: Your salary isn't set by your boss's generosity. It's set by supply and demand â€” for you.

buildup.text: The labor market works like any market. Your skills are the supply; employer needs are the demand.

discovery.text: Rare, high-demand skills command premium wages. Common skills in oversupply earn less.

twist.text: But labor markets have frictions. Geography, discrimination, and information gaps create wage disparities.

climax.text: Investing in skills that are scarce and in demand is the single most effective personal finance strategy.

punchline.text: You are a product in the labor market.

quiz.question: What primarily determines wage levels?
options: Supply of and demand for specific skills
